Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features and benefits that we believe will enhance your experience. For this remarkable opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer of $150. This price reflects the high quality and value that this product delivers. I look forward to your consideration and the chance to provide you with an outstanding solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
